abstract: Fares D. Noujaim suffered an emotional and financial blow when the investment bank imploded. Now he gets a chance to start anew.
snippet: Fares D. Noujaim suffered an emotional and financial blow when the investment bank imploded. Now he gets a chance to start anew.
lead_paragraph: As a vice chairman and longtime stockholder of Bear Stearns, Fares D. Noujaim suffered an emotional and financial blow when the investment bank imploded.

headline.main: A Bear Stearns Refugee Gets a New Start at Merrill
headline.print_headline: A Bear Stearns Refugee Gets a New Start at Merrill
